title: Float division by zero
body:
I always have this error can someone tell me something about it?
and the loss is also very high, why?

Epoch 00033: loss did not improve from 250.62939
Epoch 00033: ReduceLROnPlateau reducing learning rate to 9.99999897748e-17.
/Users/lucaalunni/opt/anaconda3/envs/fermi/lib/python2.7/site-packages/keras/engine/saving.py:292: UserWarning: No training configuration found in save file: the model was *not* compiled. Compile it manually.
  warnings.warn('No training configuration found in save file: '

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 291, in <module>
    _main_(args)
  File "train.py", line 279, in _main_
    average_precisions = evaluate(infer_model, valid_generator)
  File "/Users/lucaalunni/Desktop/keras-yolo3/utils/utils.py", line 48, in evaluate
    pred_boxes = get_yolo_boxes(model, raw_image, net_h, net_w, generator.get_anchors(), obj_thresh, nms_thresh)[0]
  File "/Users/lucaalunni/Desktop/keras-yolo3/utils/utils.py", line 260, in get_yolo_boxes
    do_nms(boxes, nms_thresh)        
  File "/Users/lucaalunni/Desktop/keras-yolo3/utils/utils.py", line 166, in do_nms
    if bbox_iou(boxes[index_i], boxes[index_j]) >= nms_thresh:
  File "/Users/lucaalunni/Desktop/keras-yolo3/utils/bbox.py", line 57, in bbox_iou
    return float(intersect) / union
ZeroDivisionError: float division by zero
